name: Union Pacific Corporation
summary: Union Pacific Corporation, founded in 1862, is the largest railroad network in North America, operating over 32,000 miles of rail in 23 U.S. states. Headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, Union Pacific provides freight transportation, logistics, and intermodal services, connecting major U.S. ports and gateways to Canada and Mexico. The company is publicly traded and ranks among the top U.S. corporations by market capitalization and revenue.
